title: Alpha IP&RP
body: Do we still get the IP and RP for the alpha shop? Because if so i didnt get anything...

replies.body:
Yes, you still get the IP as usual for each of your games. The same is true for other rewards such as hextech materials.

The RP and IP values don't update immediately in the client because that will come when the store is added.

Thanks for testing the alpha!
What is the next thing u guys will be focusing on, or do we have to wait to see it on the alpha client webpage?
I think i've seen somewhere that the next focus area is Normal Draft and Ranked Draft
Yeah, draft mode is a big feature that we are working on currently.
